description: Detects remote task creation via at.exe or API interacting with ATSVC namedpipe Author: Samir Bousseaden. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Remote Task Creation via ATSVC Named Pipe
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"5145" AND winlog.event_data.ShareName:\\\*\\IPC$ AND winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:"atsvc" AND Accesses:*WriteData*)
